Name: Xobni

Name: Jumpchat
One_liner: A platform bridging mobile text messages email and IM communication without needing to download anything.

Name: Likebetter
One_liner: An online personality test game where you look at two photos and choose which one you "Like Better".

Name: Zanbazaar

Name: Pollground
One_liner: Online polls. A social polling site. Pollground allows you to easily create surveys and allow the wisdom of the crowd to answer your questions. Questions and comments can be posted anonymously.
